title: Didn't receive a level up capsule.
body: I just hit level 57 and didn't get a capsule. Bug?

replies.body: Seems like a number of players are seeing missing XP after some matches as well as a few stray level up capsules. No worries fam, refresh your client and let me know if you see it now.
Happened to me, as well. There are also some games on my match history that aren't showing XP gained, too.

The same thing happen to me today.  I had just turned level 50 and I didn't receive my capsule.  I checked the match where I leveled up and didn't get any XP for it either.[](https://imgur.com/2JWY9Li)
Same here, my match history doesn't show any XP either.
